_header: Middle Earth for man was made / Unmighty are his most meed
_description: Man must fight Three Foes — seven 11-line stanzas (ababababcbc)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Middelerd for mon wes madvnmihti aren is meste
                    mede…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…ant on ys ryhthond hente roweWyþ ryht wysemen to
                    aryse
BLHar2253.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.
